name: Befront
title: befront.io
shortDescription: Befront offers a unique approach to learning design by integrating real-life cases into its training modules. Users can enhance their UX/UI skills using Befront's interactive Figma Plugin, which provides bite-sized practical tasks and instant feedback. Ideal for aspiring designers, this tool helps users become proficient in Figma through guided tutorials and continuous practice. An example use case is a beginner designer wanting to improve their skills systematically while working on real-world design challenges.
